Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D

Class Spaceship

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Abstract.Entity
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Abstract.AbstractSpaceship
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D.Spaceship
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class Spaceship extends AbstractSpaceship implements Constants
This class is a superclass of AbstractSpaceship. It defines the Spaceship object.
It implements the Constants interface to use the constants.

  • Constructor Details

    • Spaceship

      public Spaceship(int x, int y)
      Creates the Spaceship object.
      Parameters:
      x - x-position.
      y - y-position.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the spaceship. If it goes beyond the screen dimension it set the x and y position to the edge position.

    • getMissiles

      public List<Missile> getMissiles()
      Returns the missiles list.
      Returns:
      The missiles list.

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      This method gets called from the game keyPressed function.
      If the missiles size is less than 3 it calls the fire function when space bar is pressed.
      If the left or right arrow key is pressed it sets dx to the speed in that direction.
      Parameters:
      e - keyEvent, used to get keyCode.

    • fire

      public void fire()
      This function is called from the keyPressed function. It adds a Missile object to the missiles list.

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
      This function resets dx so that when the arrow key is released, the spaceship does not move.
      Parameters:
      e - keyEvent, used to get keyCode.

    • hit

      public void hit()
      plays the hitSound when the ship is hit.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g)
      Draws image.
      Specified by:
      draw in class AbstractSpaceship
      Parameters:
      g - , Allows drawing.
